description: This table stores discrete allergies information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: ALG_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores a unique reference identifier to identify a specific instance of an allergy.

columns.name: ALG_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the overall allergy severity.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


High


Medium


Low

columns.name: ALG_DATE_NOTED_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date when the allergy was noted by the external system.

columns.name: ALG_DATE_RESOLVD_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date of when the allergy was resolved.

columns.name: ALG_SRC_LPL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the source Problem List record identifier.

columns.name: ALG_TYPE_OF_CHNG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of change being performed on the allergy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Receive


Edit


Delete

columns.name: ALGN_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the display name of the allergen as sent by the external source.

columns.name: ALGN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Allergen record identifier that maps to the allergen from the external source.

columns.name: ALGN_ID_ALLERGEN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the allergen record.

columns.name: ALG_TYPE
columns.description: This item stores the textual allergy type sent by the external source.

columns.name: ALG_TYPE_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the category value which maps to the allergy type sent by  the external source.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Systemic


Drug Class


Food


Environmental


Animal


Plant


Chemical


Drug Ingredient


Drug


opt

columns.name: ALG_SRC_DXR_CSN
columns.description: This item will store the contact serial (CSN) number of the Received Document record that owns the instance of this allergy.

columns.name: ALG_DUP_OVRD_LPL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the record identifier of the local allergy that this external allergy should be grouped with.

columns.name: ALG_LAST_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the date and time when the allergy was last updated by the external system.

columns.name: ALG_PT_SRC_APP_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this allergy is a patient-entered allergy (i.e. DXR type = 25), this item stores the application which was used to edit the allergy for the contact (e.g. MyChart or Welcome). If blank, this is assumed to be MyChart. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


MyChart


Welcome

columns.name: ALGRX_TYPE
columns.description: This item stores the text value of the allergy reaction type sent by the external source.

columns.name: ALGRX_TYPE_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the category value which maps to the allergy reaction type sent by the external source.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ALG_DT_NOTED_NF_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the nullFlavor value from the effectiveTime low node in a received CDA document. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Information


Invalid


Derived


Other


Negative infinity


Positive infinity


Un-encoded


Masked


Not applicable


Unknown


Asked but unknown


Temporarily unavailable


Not asked


Sufficient quantity


Trace


Not present


User Selected

columns.name: ALG_DT_RESOLV_NF_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the nullFlavor value from the effectiveTime high node in a received CDA document.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ALG_DT_NOTED_NF_C_NAME

columns.name: ALG_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the value from the statusCode node in a received CDA document. This item itself is not the status of the allergy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Normal


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: ALG_STATUS_ENTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the value from the status entryRelationship node in a received CDA document. This item itself is not the status of the allergy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Resolved

columns.name: ALG_HIST_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The item indicates whether the allergy is current or historical.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current


Historical


Inactive


Discontinued


Deleted

columns.name: ALG_HIST_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date that the historical status for this allergy is valid through. After this date, the historical status needs to be rechecked.

columns.name: ALG_SRC_WPR_ID
columns.description: Stores the Patient Access Accounts ID of the MyChart user who edited the allergy for the contact.

columns.name: ALG_CRITICALITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the category value for overall allergy criticality.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unable to assess


High


Low


Moderate


Fatal

columns.name: ALG_CRITICALITY_TXT
columns.description: This item stores the free text allergy criticality.

columns.name: ALG_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the encounter that the allergy was added on.
